name: AI Upscaler Plugin
description: Professional AI video upscaling with 9 models, cross-platform GPU acceleration, and advanced features for Jellyfin.
overview: Transform your video library with AI-powered upscaling. Features: 9 AI models (Real-ESRGAN, Waifu2x, HAT, SwinIR, etc.), hardware acceleration, cross-platform support, and intelligent content detection.
